amendment.description: An amendment numbered 26 printed in Part B of House Report 115-712 to provide $5 million to better assist veterans exposed to burn pi ts by improving the existing registry and increasing clinical research on burn pit exposure. Decreases the Community Care account by the same amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Welch amendment (A057) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A057) offered by Mr. Welch.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Welch amendment (A057) Agreed to by voice vote.
